name: LSM BPO Canada
description:
Established as a multi-disciplinary business process outsourcing company, LSM BPO specializes in helping small and medium enterprises in Canada, Australia, and New Zealand achieve growth and maintain a thriving business through a suite of services tailored around their exacting demands.
A company defined by passion, commitment, and professionalism, LSM BPO is spearheaded by a team of BPO professionals who not only have years of experience in a range of disciplines but are also equipped with the proper training, skills, and expertise necessary to get the job done. While we may not be a big company, our size is our strength. It allows us to move efficiently, focus on the need at hand, cascade responsibilities, and be flexible enough so that we are able to adapt to every situation.
